nodes.text: Wrea was a planet in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that was mostly covered in oceans, with little land masses scattered over the surface. It was the homeworld of the aquatic Wrean species. During the Clone Wars, it hosted a comm tower. Wrea was notoriously difficult to reach, because of the Smuggler's Run asteroid belt nearby. It was for this reason that freedom fighter Saw Gerrera established a base for his Partisans insurgent group here during the reign of the Galactic Empire.
